review_data.title: Authentic palestinian food with vegetarian and vegan options.
review_data.content: Probably the best take away in Zürich. Be ready to queue, the place is quite popular (it's Zürich counterpart of Berlin' Mustafa's Gemüse Kebab). Their sabich (order without egg to be vegan) and falafel are full of flavours! They serve them with fresh hummus, fries...More

review_data.title: Die beste Imbissbude der Langstrasse!
review_data.content: Kleine Auswahl an palästinensischen Speisen, aber die sind allesamt sensationell zubereitet! Eine Institution an der Langstrasse!

review_data.title: Not a normal takeaway...
review_data.content: I've been there several times and nothing compares the quality and freshness of this middle-east restaurant to the rest. review_data.content: This place is a kiosk with a few standing tables in front and a few tables in the open. Not for rainy days! Very popular, but on the pricey side (for what it is). The serve sandwiches (chicken or vegi).
